title: Dispatch Crew for Outage Repair
description: Following an outage, the system needs to dispatch the nearest available crew to the fault location.
core_function: Fault Location, Isolation, and Service Restoration (FLISR)

tasks.description: Get the confirmed fault location from the FLISR system.
tasks.expected_outcome: System has the GPS coordinates of the needed repair.

tasks.description: Query the mobile workforce management system for the real-time location and status of all field crews.
tasks.expected_outcome: System gets the location and availability of all crews.

tasks.description: Identify the closest available crew and dispatch them to the fault location with all relevant outage details.
tasks.expected_outcome: System sends a work order to the optimal crew's mobile device.
